mapper.insert: insert into fund_account (user_id, password, password_salt, lian_account_status, has_invest, hq_balance_amt, hq_not_acct_profit_amt, hq_withdraw_freezing_amt, hq_total_recharge_amt, hq_total_withdraw_amt, hq_total_profit_amt, hq_last_recharge_time, hq_last_withdraw_time, hq_last_profit_time, hq_float_rates, hq_coupon_rates, hq_coupon_begin_time, hq_coupon_end_time, hq_withdraw_flag, hq_day_total_withdraw_amt, hq_month_withdraw_count, coupons_id) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lianAccountStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasInvest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hqBalanceAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqNotAcctProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqWithdrawFreezingAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqTotalRechargeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqTotalWithdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqTotalProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqLastRechargeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hqLastWithdrawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hqLastProfitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hqFloatRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqCouponRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqCouponBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hqCouponEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hqWithdrawFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hqDayTotalWithdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hqMonthWithdrawCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponsId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update fund_account set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_salt = #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lian_account_status = #{lianAccountStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_invest = #{hasInvest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hq_balance_amt = #{hqBalanceAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_not_acct_profit_amt = #{hqNotAcctProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_withdraw_freezing_amt = #{hqWithdrawFreezingAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_total_recharge_amt = #{hqTotalRechargeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_total_withdraw_amt = #{hqTotalWithdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_total_profit_amt = #{hqTotalProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_last_recharge_time = #{hqLastRechargeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hq_last_withdraw_time = #{hqLastWithdrawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hq_last_profit_time = #{hqLastProfitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hq_float_rates = #{hqFloatRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_coupon_rates = #{hqCouponRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_coupon_begin_time = #{hqCouponBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hq_coupon_end_time = #{hqCouponEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hq_withdraw_flag = #{hqWithdrawFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hq_day_total_withdraw_amt = #{hqDayTotalWithdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hq_month_withdraw_count = #{hqMonthWithdrawCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupons_id = #{couponsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, password, password_salt, lian_account_status, has_invest, hq_balance_amt, hq_not_acct_profit_amt, hq_withdraw_freezing_amt, hq_total_recharge_amt, hq_total_withdraw_amt, hq_total_profit_amt, hq_last_recharge_time, hq_last_withdraw_time, hq_last_profit_time, hq_float_rates, hq_coupon_rates, hq_coupon_begin_time, hq_coupon_end_time, hq_withdraw_flag, hq_day_total_withdraw_amt, hq_month_withdraw_count, coupons_id from fund_account where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select user_id, password, password_salt, lian_account_status, has_invest, hq_balance_amt, hq_not_acct_profit_amt, hq_withdraw_freezing_amt, hq_total_recharge_amt, hq_total_withdraw_amt, hq_total_profit_amt, hq_last_recharge_time, hq_last_withdraw_time, hq_last_profit_time, hq_float_rates, hq_coupon_rates, hq_coupon_begin_time, hq_coupon_end_time, hq_withdraw_flag, hq_day_total_withdraw_amt, hq_month_withdraw_count, coupons_id from fund_account
